dessert.name: Cheese Cake
dessert.description: A creamy and decadent dessert with a smooth, velvety filling made from cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla, resting on a buttery graham cracker crust

dessert.name: Red Velvet Cake
dessert.description: A rich and moist cake with a striking red color, paired with a creamy and tangy cream cheese frosting

dessert.name: Chocolate Brownie
dessert.description: A rich and fudgy chocolate treat, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside

dessert.name: Chocolate Muffin
dessert.description: A soft and fluffy muffin packed with rich chocolate flavor

dessert.name: Blueberry Muffin
dessert.description: A soft and moist muffin bursting with juicy blueberries

dessert.name: Truffles
dessert.description: Indulgent bite-sized chocolates with a rich, creamy center, coated in cocoa powder, nuts, or chocolate shavings

dessert.name: Ice Cream Sundae
dessert.description: A classic dessert featuring scoops of creamy ice cream topped with your choice of sauces, whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry on top
